experience.title: Senior Mobile Engineer
info: Upgraded battery health by 18% through a GPS-enhanced algorithm, drawing on expertise in geolocation optimization.
Merged object detection and mesh algorithms, achieving a 34% size reduction and 21% faster 3D object rendering.

experience.title: Lead Mobile Engineer
info: Successfully migrated 100% of the existing JavaScript-based React Native codebase to TypeScript, resulting in a 32% reduction in potential runtime errors.
Introduced a modular component architecture, leading to a 40% increase in code reusability and facilitating 25% faster development of new features.
Implemented effective dependency management strategies, ensuring the project stays up-to-date with the latest libraries and frameworks, resulting in a 23% reduction in outdated dependencies.

experience.title: Team Lead
info: Led the entire 'TomYo Skills' project from concept to launch, including mobile, web, backend, and business and technical integrations.
Boosted user engagement by 28% by successfully implementing interactive animations inspired by Apple's design.
Cultivated and refined strong soft skills, including leadership and communication, while fostering a collaborative work environment and achieving a successful project launch

experience.title: Mobile Developer
info: Initialized responsive and adaptive UI guidelines that improved consistency and usability across all devices, while eliminating various device-based UI bugs through thorough testing and analysis

Maintained, and optimized React Native (RN) components, screens, and features for the mobile app, leveraging Test-Driven Development (TDD) practices to ensure high-quality code and optimal user experience

experience.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
info: Architected application following Atomic Design Principal, resulting in a 45% increase in the reusability of components.
Designed a comprehensive Story Book for all components, effectively reducing development time by 26% and fostering enhanced collaboration among team members
AWS infrastructure setup including EC2, Route53, SSL, S3, Blue-Green Deployment, and CI/CD pipeline.
Deployed and distributed mobile app updates on App Store, Play Store, and App Gallery.
Experience in designing and executing complex Postgres queries for business analytics using Metabase.
